attributes.additional_details:
This petition has been created by Year 6 children and we feel we know what is best for our education.
Please review Michael Rosen's social media profiles to see how knowledgeable and inspirational he is.
attributes.background: Having completed our SATs this week we have concluded that Michael Rosen would make an inspirational Education Minister because he is a very influential children's author who has the knowledge, skills and experience to take on this role, as he truly understands how children learn.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. That includes petitions asking for someone to be given a job.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to make a specific change to its education policy.  We can only accept petitions from named individuals, not organisations or groups.
